personal.name: Serhii Bilous
personal.title: Frontend Developer
personal.summary:
I am a skilled front-end developer with nearly 10 years of experience working on diverse projects, ranging from small SPAs to large e-commerce platforms and CMS integrations.

I've contributed to projects at every stage, from inception to completion, collaborating closely with designers and back-end developers to deliver user-centric solutions. Committed to best practices and clean code, I prioritize maintainability and scalability in every project.

Known for my adaptability, quick learning, and teamwork, I thrive in dynamic environments and enjoy tackling challenging tasks.

experience.description: As part of the WebSolutions Unit at Shape Agency, I contributed to projects spanning the entire digital product lifecycle, with a focus on sustainability and scalability to support long-term growth and potential spin-offs.
achievements: Development and implementation of various web applications
Planned development concepts, reusability of components, and best practices
Ensured usability and performance of applications across various end devices
Translated design templates into functional, pixel-perfect, and responsive web interfaces
Conducted mutual code reviews and joint optimizations

experience.description: Maintained, developed, and improved e-commerce shops operating across Europe, primarily on the OXID platform, using Smarty templates, plain JavaScript, VueJS, Dynamic Yield for fast marketing integrations and A/B testing, and Cloudinary for asset management and performance optimization.
achievements: Led a team to unify and redesign projects by optimizing multiple themes and shops into one scalable and universal template
Continuously implemented new features, fixed bugs, and supported shops
Improved performance and optimized shop operations
Created and extended modules; migrated from OXID5 to OXID6
Led migration from the OXID platform to CommerceTools, using VSF and Storyblok on the frontend

experience.description: Started as a junior developer and advanced to a strong mid-level position after completing more than 30 diverse projects
achievements: Applied self-learned CSS, HTML, and jQuery skills in real-world enterprise projects
Extended knowledge of best practices in web development
Delivered several successful WordPress projects within the first few months
Became a mentor for junior frontend developers and took on team lead roles in various projects
Worked on VueJS and Magento projects during the last year

hobbies: I enjoy all mountain-related activities and everything involving boards, such as snowboarding, skateboarding, and kiting.
